snippet: The price of oil rose nearly 3 percent this week on expectations that U.S. drivers would hit the road and drive up demand for gasoline....

headline.print_headline: Oil Up 3 Pct for the Week as Driving Season Nears
headline.main: Oil Up 3 Pct for the Week as Driving Season Nears

lead_paragraph: The price of oil rose nearly 3 percent this week on expectations that U.S. drivers would hit the road and drive up demand for gasoline.
